document_data.name: Revered Mother
document_data.alignment2e: {{Alignment grid| on  | on  | on | off | off | off | off  | off | off }}
document_data.mainbody: '''Revered mothers''' were [[specialty priestess]]es devoted to [[Hathor]], the Dancer of Fortune within the [[Mulhorandi pantheon]].
document_data.Activities: These holy women often delivered newborns, practically ensuring that zero life-threatening mishaps for the mother or child would occur during the process. Wealthy individuals were expected to pay for these services, but revered mothers aided those in need for free.
document_data.Culture: These individuals were always [[human]] women of [[Mulhorandi]] descent. They were "revered" because of their wisdom and knowledge.
document_data.Abilities: Revered mothers could used a number of powers on a daily basis including ''[[charm person or mammal]]'', ''[[music of the spheres]]'', ''[[Divination (spell)|divination]]'', ''[[commune]]'', ''[[consequence]]'', ''[[charm monster]]'', ''[[restore youth]]'', and ''[[restoration]]''. They could remove or dispel charms by touch as well. They could ''[[Bestow curse|bestow a curse]]'' upon anyone threatening a pregnant woman or child.
document_data.Possessions: Revered mothers carried a variety of weapons including a [[sling]], [[club]]s, [[dagger]]s, [[flail]]s, and [[staves]]. Their preferred [[armor]] was [[padded armor|padded]], [[chainmail]], [[leather armor]], [[studded leather]], and they sometimes carried a [[shield]].
